title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Generative AI-Assisted Object-Oriented Programming Project-Based Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming syntax (variables, conditionals, loops) and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can complete three or more real-world problem-solving projects using OOP core concepts (classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism).
Learners can self-diagnose and correct code errors with 70% or higher accuracy using generative AI tools (chatbots).
Learners can improve the readability and reusability of project deliverables by 20% or more by incorporating peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
